Game information:

Spain, 1514. Brothers Theodore and Ramon inventors working in his
Barcelona studio on another of his creation, when Ramona takes in
their dungeons of the Inquisition. Theodore will finish the job
with his brother, to visit many countries and solve many problems
in order to save Ramona and to find out where she is and what she
is, a mysterious country Zerzura, oasis, lost deep in the Sahara,
and not hiding a secret.

Repack Features:

The Lost Chronicles of Zerzura

Includes crack text from ZoG Forum Team
